Title: Lion
Writer: Saroo Brierley (adapted from the book "A Long Way Home" by), Luke Davies (screenplay by)
Actors: Sunny Pawar, Abhishek Bharate, Priyanka Bose, Khushi Solanki
Plot: A five-year-old Indian boy is adopted by an Australian couple after getting lost hundreds of kilometers from home. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.
Awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 59 wins & 100 nominations.
Production: See-Saw Films, Sunstar Entertainment, Aquarius Films
